content: flopsie bunny pattern mmmmaaaatttteeeerrrriiiiaaaallllssss nnnneeeeeeeeddddeeeedddd * yarn of your choice preferably worsted weight or thicker cheap non-shiny acrylic is best for beginners i used vanna s choice solid but it is thinner and wool * crochet hook of your choice-my choice is a bamboo hook size e * plastic animal eyes the pictured bunny has 9mm eyes * embroidery yarn for the face * darning needle * straight pins * polyfill stuffing llllnnnnttttrrrroooodddduuuuccccttttiiiioooonnnn hopefully you have basic knowledge of how to make up a simple amigurumi lf not l will do my best to keep this simple lf you have any questions or problems please feel free to email me the number in parenthesis are the total number of stitches per row also there are some visuals to help you out if you re lost and some pro−tips at the end abbreviations chain = chain stitch single_crochet = single_crochet stitch increase = increase 2 single_crochet in same stitch decrease = decrease l single_crochet over two stitches tbl = through back loops creates shaping sl = slip_stitch pull up a loop and through the loop on hook = repeat everything enclosed in stars the listed number of * times after the star hhhheeeeaaaadddd round 1 chain 2 6 single_crochet in second chain from hook round 2 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 12 round 3 *single_crochet 1 increase 1* repeat 5 times 18 round 4 *single_crochet 2 increase 1* repeat 5 times 24 round 5 *single_crochet 3 increase 1* repeat 5 times 30 round 6 *single_crochet 4 increase 1* repeat 5 times 36 round 7 *single_crochet 5 increase 1* repeat 5 times 42 round 8-19 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 42 add the eyes and face after round 19 also begin stuffing a little each round here or the opening will be too small to work with round 20 *single_crochet 5 decrease 1* repeat 5 times 36 round 21 *single_crochet 4 decrease 1* repeat 5 times 30 round 22 *single_crochet 3 decrease 1* repeat 5 times 24 round 23 *single_crochet 2 decrease 1* repeat 5 times 18 round 24 *single_crochet 1 decrease 1* repeat 5 times 12 round 25 *decrease every stitch around* repeat 6 times 6 finish off and leave
